ComicInfo.Summary: With the help of the Tin Woodman and the Cowardly Lion, Dorothy finally reaches the Emerald City. But there are surprises along the way, like the three deaths of Jack Pumpkinhead! Plus, the Shaggy Man reveals the shameful secret of the Love Magnet.
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric Shanower,L. Frank Baum,Eric Shanower,L. Frank Baum
